title: error in practice tool
body: i have  just unlocked the practice tool and when i opened it to try riven {{champion:92}}  for the first time it was just 5 seconds it my ping went from 89~100 to 500 ms but when i play online my ping is always like 85 or 100,so why does this only happen with the practice tool

replies.body: Yea that's pretty weird that you'd have some crazy ping spikes like that in the practice tool but not in actual pvp games. It could have just been a hiccup in your connection for some reason, but let's check out what your network looked like by grabbing some network logs and letting our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) scan them. Take a screenshot and post it here so I can take a look as well!
